personal-data-instruction: Here, you should provide your personal information and a brief description of your outstanding professional skills, relevant achievements, and personal qualities that make you an ideal candidate for the position.
title: Title
description: With Tecsify Prodigy, you can create your professional resume and take the next step in your career
title-tag: Tecsify Prodigy - create a professional resume in minutes
home-description: The tool that will help you create a professional resume in a matter of minutes
home-description-2: Our intuitive and user-friendly platform allows you to enter your work and education history, skills, and accomplishments quickly and easily, and download your resume as a professional PDF file with just one click.
lenguage-select: Select your language and start creating your resume to take the next step in your professional career!
personal-details-example: Hello, I'm Alan Turing, a junior software developer with a great enthusiasm for natural language processing. Although I am still young in the industry, I am confident that my quick learning ability, creativity, and perseverance are valuable skills that I can bring to any project I'm involved in. I'm excited to put my knowledge into practice and continue learning while helping to solve exciting problems in the software world.
delete-photo: I do not want to use my photo
photo-bw-label: Convert photo to black and white
photo-bw-text: By converting your photo to black and white, you eliminate potential distractions caused by vibrant colors, keeping the reader's focus on the essential content of your resume.
photo-info: Including a profile photo in your resume helps personalize it and makes you more easily memorable to employers. Additionally, it provides a positive initial impression and conveys professionalism and confidence.
traduccion-disclaimer: Your resume will be automatically translated by our artificial intelligence. We recommend doing a quick review of the translation to ensure it accurately captures your skills and experience.
